name: intriguing-stone
effect: Trade for a Sun Stone in X and Y, or Pidgeotite in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.
short_effect: Trade for a Sun Stone in X and Y, or Pidgeotite in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A rather curious stone that might
appear to be valuable to some.
It’s all in the eye of the beholder.
